price: ߊ߬ ߣߴߊ߬ ߞߊ߬ ߞߊߙߏ ߞߍ߫ ߦߋߟߋ߲ ߘߌ߫ ( ߛߊ߲ ) ߠߎ߬ ߞߣߐ߫ ߸ ߞߊ߬ ߕߋ߬ߟߋ ߞߍ߫ ߕߊߘߎ߲ ߘߌ߫؟
arabic: وَجَعَلَ ٱلۡقَمَرَ فِيهِنَّ نُورٗا وَجَعَلَ ٱلشَّمۡسَ سِرَاجٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wajaʿala al-qamara fīhinna nūran wajaʿala al-shamsa sirājan
